info.name: AtData API
info.description: AtData API's help you improve the quality and depth of your customer data by enabling you to quickly and securely verify and enhance email addresses.

query.description: The email address to be validated

request.description: The SafeToSend API verifies email addresses to filter out invalid and high risk email addresses which results in higher open rates, clicks and conversions.

query.description: The email address to be validated

response.name: Invalid API key

query.description: The email address to be validated

response.body: API Key is not the correct length. Please make sure you are passing the correct value.

query.description: Five-digit zip and, optionally, four-digit extension separated by a dash
Five-digit zip and, optionally, four-digit extension separated by a dash
The email address to be appended
The email address to be appended

response.name: Sample Query by Name and Postal Address

query.description: Five-digit zip and, optionally, four-digit extension separated by a dash

header.description: Your AtData API key
Type of media to be sent.
If email address is in the file, the index of the column containing it, starting at 1.
Used to indicate the presense of a header line with a value of true or false; default=false. Must be used for non-email fields.
The character used to separate multiple columns within the file; default variable is tab (\t).
For all services except validation, only produce a match report and do not purchase data.
File name, which must use one of these file extensions: .txt, .csv or .zip; default=myfile.csv.
A comma-separated list of the data fields you want returned. By default, all available fields are returned.
a valid webhook/callback url with a max length of 512 characters, that can accept POST requests with a JSON payload and uses https or http (https is strongly encouraged)

formdata.description: File with list of customers to be validated.

item.name: Fraud Prevention API's

query.description: API key for accessing the service.
The email address to be evaluated for fraud.
Internal identifier for the email or transaction.
First line of the postal address, including number.
ZIP or postcode of the postal address.

request.description: Retrieves fraud risk information based on the provided email and optional personal data.

formdata.description: A tab-separated file containing feedback data.

query.description: API key for accessing the service.

request.description: Submits feedback about identified fraud through a tab-separated file.

item.description:
The AtData Fraud Prevention API provides detailed information about email addresses and their risk and fraud correlation.

See the documentation at [https://atdata-fraud.readme.io/reference/overview](https://atdata-fraud.readme.io/reference/overview)
